sentences.sContent: I can't bear the sound of chalk scraping on a blackboard.
sentences.sContent_eng: I can't bear the sound of chalk scraping on a blackboard.
sentences.sCn: 我忍受不了粉笔在黑板上的刮擦声。

sentences.sContent: Elephants and other animals could walk freely without scraping their head on the ceiling -- with plenty of room to spare.
sentences.sContent_eng: Elephants and other animals could walk freely without scraping their head on the ceiling -- with plenty of room to spare.
sentences.sCn: 大象和其他动物可以自由走动而不让天花板刮到它们的头部——那里有着充足的备用空间。

sentences.sContent: Or, like me, you can go back and forth, alternatively scraping off the accumulated gunk and making yourself more accessible by taking on more of it.
sentences.sContent_eng: Or, like me, you can go back and forth, alternatively scraping off the accumulated gunk and making yourself more accessible by taking on more of it.
sentences.sCn: 或者像我一样，你可以后退或者前进，抑或是刮去那堆堆积物，通过呈现更多使你自己变得更加容易接近。

synos.tran: 刮削下的碎屑；刮擦声；抹去
